conversations.content: What color is the phone booth in the image?
The phone booth in the image is red.
What objects can be found next to the red phone booth?
Next to the red phone booth, there are two wooden benches.
What is the condition of the sidewalk in the image?
The sidewalk in the image is wet.
What objects are lined up along the sidewalk?
Along the sidewalk, there are phone booths, benches, and trash cans lined up.
Is the image taken during daytime or evening?
The image is taken in the late evening.
